thread.section_title: Loopmasters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Loopmasters | www.loopmasters.com | 6 of 115
thread.title: Paul Sanders

author: Paul Sanders
title: Paul Sanders
text:
Buy Presets and use them to learn how to use the VST to create sound personal to you. The presets have great examples for you to choose from and most are mapped already to key control parameters. Loopmasters has great range of genres to choose from so anyone can find something in their style. Great for meshing various genres together to allow you to be versatile and unique.
Don't go for the just loops packs unless you are just starting out. Tons of One shots and instrument presets to get you producing your sound.
